content.question: Let <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function given by <math alttext="g of x, equals, 3 times x to the fourth power, minus 8 times x cubed " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>. At what value of <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> on the closed interval <math alttext="open bracket, negative 2 comma 2, close bracket " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> does <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> have an absolute maximum?

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
